headline.main: SEARLE GETS D.S.C. FOR HEROISM IN JAVA; Purple Hearts Awarded to Two Air Corps Members in Australia

lead_paragraph: AT UNITED NATIONS HEAD-QUARTERS, Australia, May 31 (AP) -- General MacArthur's Head-quarters announced today that a Distinguished Service Cross had been conferred on Colonel Albert C. Searle "for extraordinary heroism in action at Bandung, Java, Feb. 27."
abstract: Col A C Searle awarded DSC for action, Bandung, Java
